title: I need support in Spanish
text: I need support in Spanish

title: I believe when I first signed up the…
text: I believe when I first signed up the agent was very helpful,and when I needed a question answered I feel she was just there to get m e started or signed up!then I got transferred to a different country where I dealt with a call center that did not understand,the language barrier was poor.thanks Freddy Muschamp.

title: The process of signing up for life insurance
text: The process of signing up for life insurance with TruStage was easy to get through.  I didn't need to speak to a representative but there was one available.  The only negative thing I have to say is all life insurance companies are too expensive for the elderly with low income.

title: Trustage
text: It was easy, great company and people

title: Fast Easy Affordable
text: Took little time to learn about, complete application, and get coverage. Extremely simplistic and highly affordable. If there's a downfall, it's that they do not have this option for regular life insurance. It is often unaffordable dor people 60+.

title: Onboarding was easy waiting for more…
text: Onboarding was easy waiting for more information to confirm how great of a company they really are

title: Contented Customers' Reviews
text: My husband at age 77 felt he could trust Mark Kent to be honest and reliable when it comes to sorting out details involved with a life well planned and executed.  I had no life insurance above basic Canadian government (which is enough for me); however, I was thrilled when Mark explained TruStage would pay for xtra details in the event of my Death and I would not have to worry so much about leaving my husband Raymond in a place of hardship.  My husband's policy was paid in full and mine should be in 10 years when I am 75.  We are grateful for your dedicated service.

title: A Bang For My Buck !
text: I am very pleased with the amount of coverage my family has for a great premium monthly fee. I also like how quick customer service is to attend to any changes or issues on the policy.

title: Competitive Pricing on Whole Life for Seniors!
text: This company offered competitive pricing on a life insurance policy for my age group (60+). I was glad to find it. The conditions are fair (lesser payout amount if I die within the first two years, unless by accident). I was able to set up automatic payments after receiving my policy documents in the mail.

title: This company made thing easy and…
text: This company made thing easy and convenient.I didn't have to upload any information or medical records. Nor did I have to answer a million questions.

title: The experience was great because it let…
text: The experience was great because it let me give my honest opinion on the policy. Trustage insurance is a great start for insurance young adults.

title: Am glad they gave me instant approval.
text: Date of experience: September 27, 2024

title: This is my first policy
text: This is my first policy, I never had life insurance. The process was straight forward. The representative answered all my questions and took the time to explain my policy. In addition to my policy I added the accidental death and dismemberment policy. This policy is  a game changer for me.

title: I like your service very much and…
text: I like your service very much and you're very professional when I call you on the phone. However, as I said earlier, I just can't understand how you can charge me 3 × 2 jump up to a higher rate. Cause when you're on social security. That amount you're asking for is impossible to pay.

title: Finally Paid Claim.
text: Updated Review: I am changing my review of Trustage to 4 stars in the final update 7-27-23.They have finally paid out after almost 4 weeks wait. The delay was from the fact that my mom passed out outside the US.After reading my initial review where I gave 1 star, they reached out to me, asked for a couple more documents, and they finally paid out.I would have given 5 stars, had it not been initially delayed but overall, they are good company to buy insurance from.

title: 2040 cheers to new start on life
text: Honestly. This was a hard time. I was working got hurt at work, my identity got stolen and my life fell apart. This las year i lost my kids, my home, and almost my life.

title: RegularInsurance for people who really can’t get it anywhere else life insurance
text: Regular life insurance policies would not accept me because I am on blood thinners and blood pressure pills due to atrial fibrillation. This policy is a guaranteed policy I got it for a low value just to have some money after I’ve gone to take care of expensive services. Did not feel that I could afford a. title: I was contacted by the agent
text: I was contacted by the agent. He explained the difference of the two types of insurance and which would be most beneficial for me. I took his advice and asked him to find me a policy with the best rate, which he did. He then took my application and told me he would contact me with the approval and information about the payment plan. Several days later he called me and we completed the process of setting up the payment plan. He told me when to expect the policy in the mail and to contact him if I have any questions or concerns. This was the best Insurance application process I have ever experienced and the most simple.
